title: Blurite crossbow

properties.name: description
properties.value: A blurite crossbow is a crossbow stronger than the bronze crossbow but weaker than the iron crossbow. It requires 16 Ranged to wield and can only fire bronze or blurite bolts. It has an attack range of 7 increased to 9 with longrange.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Blurite crossbow
Blurite crossbow
Released31 July 2006 (Update)
MembersYes

Advanced data
Item ID9176

A blurite crossbow is a crossbow stronger than the bronze crossbow but weaker than the iron crossbow. It requires 16 Ranged to wield and can only fire bronze or blurite bolts. It has an attack range of 7 increased to 9 with longrange.

Blurite crossbows require 24 Fletching to be made. An oak stock must be fletched from oak logs, yielding 16 Fletching experience, then blurite limbs must be attached to the stock with a hammer, yielding 32 Fletching experience and an unstrung blurite crossbow. Finally, the crossbow must be strung with a crossbow string, yielding 16 experience. In total, making a blurite crossbow yields 64 Fletching experience.

The Knight's Sword quest must be completed before a player can create this crossbow.

(update)

[[File:Blurite crossbow detail.png|left|130px]]
A '''blurite crossbow''' is a [[crossbow (weapon)|crossbow]] stronger than the [[bronze crossbow]] but weaker than the [[iron crossbow]]. It requires 16 [[Ranged]] to wield and can only fire [[Bronze bolts|bronze]] or [[blurite bolts]]. It has an attack range of 7 increased to 9 with longrange.

Blurite crossbows require 24 [[Fletching]] to be made. An [[oak stock]] must be fletched from [[oak logs]], yielding 16 Fletching [[experience]], then [[blurite limbs]] must be attached to the stock with a [[hammer]], yielding 32 Fletching experience and an [[blurite crossbow (u)|unstrung blurite crossbow]]. Finally, the crossbow must be strung with a [[crossbow string]], yielding 16 experience. In total, making a blurite crossbow yields 64 Fletching experience.

[[The Knight's Sword]] quest must be completed before a player can create this crossbow.
